Overview   Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package gui

Class Summary
AskHelpDialog Dialog that allows a player to request help of another player during a battle.
BattlePanel Panel that will display the GUI controls of a battle.
CarriedItemsDialog Dialog that displays all of a player's carried items for viewing/playing.
CharityDialog Dialog for the Charity stage of the game, where players must donate the excess cards in their hands to players of lower levels.
ChooseCardDialog Dialog that displays a list of cards for a player to choose from.
ChooseMonsterDialog Dialog that allows the player to choose a Monster Card from the monsters in a battle.
ChoosePlayerDialog Dialog that displays a list of Players for a player to choose from.
CreatePlayersDialog Dialog for choosing the name, gender, and type of Players for a new game.
CurseDialog Dialog for handling Curse Cards played on a player.
DisplayCardsDialog Dialog for viewing Cards.
EquipmentDialog Dialog for displaying, equipping, and unequipping Equipment Items.
GUI The main controlling GUI for the program.
GUITester A Singleton-type class used in testing - provides specific game manipulation methods.
HelpMeOutDialog Dialog that handles playing the Help Me Out Card.
InHandDialog Dialog for displaying and playing cards from a Player's Hand.
LoadedDieDialog Dialog that handles a Loaded Die Card.
LogDialog Used to capture data from current point in game and write it along with input problem description to standard out.
LoseCardsDialog Dialog that allows a Player to select a set number of Cards to discard.
LoseGPDialog Dialog that allows a Player to discard a certain GP value's worth of Items.
OptionDialog Dialog that lets a user choose between two options.
PlayBattleCardsDialog Dialog that allows the playing of Item Cards in a battle.
RemoveCurseDialog Dialog that allows a player to use a Wishing Ring to remove a lasting curse.
ResurrectionDialog Dialog that allows a Cleric to use the Resurrect ability.
RollDiceDialog Dialog that displays the die roll and lets a player play cards to manipulate the roll.
RunDialog Dialog that handles running away from battle.
SellItemsDialog Dialog that lets a player sell his items for levels.
StealItemDialog Dialog that lets a Thief try to steal from another player
TakeCardDialog Dialog that allows a player to take a card from another player to either keep or discard.
TakeTreasuresPanel Panel that handles the taking of treasures won from a battle.
TradeItemsDialog Dialog that allows items to be traded between players.
ViewCardsByGroupDialog Display any cards from the game deck sorted by group.
 

Enum Summary
TakeCardDialog.DrawLocation  
ViewCardsByGroupDialog.CardGroup
